section.title: Start the Storage Nodes Services
section.para: Now that the ring files are on each storage node the services can be started. On each storage node run the following: # service swift-object start # service swift-object-replicator start # service swift-object-updater start # service swift-object-auditor start # service swift-container start # service swift-container-replicator start # service swift-container-updater start # service swift-container-auditor start # service swift-account start # service swift-account-replicator start # service swift-account-reaper start # service swift-account-auditor start
